Table of Contents

Name

toyuv - convert an IRIS image to yuv format

Synopsis

toyuv inimage.rgb outimage.yuv

Description

toyuv converts an IRIS image to yuv format so it can be sent to an Abekas digital video frame store. This program normally expects an IRIS image that is 720 by 486 pixels. This image should have non-square pixels. If you want to use square pixels, provide toyuv with an IRIS image that is 640 by 486 pixels and use the [lq]-s[rq] option.

See Also

fromyuv(6D)
